Advancement Communications Contact Us Alumni  Get Involved Attend Events Stay Connected Keep Informed Share Your Story Request Official Documents Make a Gift Contact Us  Search for:    Attend Events Home / Alumni / Attend Events  Attend Events tlowery1 2020-04-02T12:00:20-05:00 For Alumni in the Miami Area: An Evening Discovering Health Care Delivery & Education MONDAY, FEBRUARY 10, 2020 7:30—9:30 P.M. THE BILTMORE HOTEL MIAMI 1200 ANASTASIA AVENUE CORAL GABLES, FL 33134 Simulation and Innovation: How Your Caregiver Prepares for You Consider the healthcare providers you will encounter in the months ahead. You’ll likely see a physician, nurse, pharmacist, dentist, social worker, psychiatrist or physical therapist. Experts from UI Health – UIC’s seven health science colleges and health care delivery enterprise – will lead a discussion that will show you the path your provider took that prepared him or her to care for you and your loved ones, and the innovative ways they will deliver your care in the decades ahead.  Christine Park MD Professor of Clinical Anesthesiology Professor of Clinical Medicine, Dept of Medical Education, Director, Simulation and Integrative Learning Institute  Robert Kiser Associate Director Simulation and Integrative Learning Institute Register at: Go.UIF.UILLINOIS.EDU/CORALGABLES For Alumni in the Chicago Area: UIC’s Response to the Opioid Epidemic We are in the midst of an opioid epidemic that impacts our families and communities across the state and the nation. As an academic and research powerhouse with resources across Illinois, UI Health is uniquely positioned to offer solutions from a variety of perspectives. Join us for an alumni networking reception with UIC’s seven health sciences colleges and hear from a panel of experts on how UIC is developing innovative solutions to address the opioid epidemic. Panelists Wayne H. Giles, MD, MS, Dean, School of Public Health Todd A. Lee, PharmD, PhD, Professor, College of Pharmacy James A. Swartz, PhD, Professor, Jane Addams College of Social Work Moderator Susan Rowan, DDS, MS, Executive Associate Dean, College of Dentistry Wednesday, March 4, 2020  6:00 p.m. Registration and networking 6:30 p.m. Presentation and discussion 7:15 p.m. Reception and networking The Hyatt Lodge  2815 Jorie Blvd.  Oak Brook, IL 60523 Reserve your spot now. Tickets are $20 per person. Please note: we will not offer CEUs for this event.  If you have additional questions, please contact the UIC Alumni Association at [email protected] or 312-413-8272. We look forward to seeing you in Oak Brook! Get ready for Rockford Alumni Reunion 2020! All alumni are invited to attend and we’ll be highlighting the classes celebrating milestone anniversaries: 1975 – 45th Anniversary 1980 – 40th Anniversary 1985 – 35th Anniversary 1990 – 30th Anniversary 1995 – 25th Anniversary 2000 – 20th Anniversary 2005 – 15th Anniversary 2010 – 10th Anniversary 2015 – 5th Anniversary Family Medicine Residency Alumni are also welcome to attend. Alumni at the 2017 Alumni Reunion enjoy a walk down Memory Lane as they check out all the class photos.  Become a Reunion Class Volunteer! As we prepare for reunion, we would like your involvement to help us make this celebration meaningful for you and your classmates. By becoming a Reunion Class Volunteer, you may assist by doing any of the following: Make personal phone calls, Send individual or mass e-mails, Connect with classmates through social media, Share contact information of classmates with whom the College has lost touch, or Contact Carrie Hermanson with your ideas for making the reunion a memorable event. Historically, classes with volunteers have seen greater participation at reunion and more success in connecting with classmates than those without. This role truly helps build excitement around reunion with your classmates. Is Your Info Updated?  Update your contact information to ensure you receive invitations to reunions and other events! Questions? For more information, contact Carrie Hermanson, director of communications and engagement, at (815) 395-5601 or [email protected] .
